original: na bhetavyaṃ na boddhavyaṃ na śrāvyaṃ vādino vacaḥ /
analyzed: na bhetavyam na boddhavyam na śrāvyam vādinaḥ vacaḥ

original: jhaṭiti prativaktavyaṃ sabhāsu vijigīṣubhiḥ // NKv_1 //
analyzed: jhaṭiti prativaktavyam sabhāsu vijigīṣubhiḥ

original: asaṃbhramo vilajjatvam avajñā prativādini /
analyzed: asaṃbhramaḥ vilajja tvam avajñā prativādini

original: hāso rājñaḥ stavaś ceti pañcaite jayahetavas // NKv_2 //
analyzed: hāsaḥ rājñaḥ stavaḥ ca iti pañca ete jaya hetavaḥ

original: uccair udghoṣya jetavyaṃ madhyasthaś ced apaṇḍitas /
analyzed: uccais udghoṣya jetavyam madhyasthaḥ ced

original: paṇḍito yadi tatraiva pakṣapāto 'dhiropyatām // NKv_3 //
analyzed: paṇḍitaḥ yadi tatra eva pakṣapātaḥ dhiropyatām

original: *VAR. 3b: udghoṣya; ed: udghuṣya (L)
analyzed: var b udghoṣay e t udghuṣ l

original: lobho hetur dhanaṃ sādhyaṃ dṛṣṭāntas tu purohitas /
analyzed: lobhaḥ hetuḥ dhanam sādhyam dṛṣṭāntaḥ tu

original: ātmotkarṣo nigamanam anumāneṣv ayaṃ vidhis // NKv_4 //
analyzed: ātma utkarṣaḥ nigamanam anumāneṣu ayam vidhiḥ

original: abhyāsyaṃ lajjamānena tattvaṃ jijñāsunā ciram /
analyzed: abhyāsyam lajjamānena tattvam jijñāsunā ciram

original: jigīṣunā hriyaṃ tyaktvā kāryaḥ kolāhalo mahān // NKv_5 //
analyzed: jigīṣunā hriyam tyaktvā kāryaḥ kolāhalaḥ mahān

original: pāṭhanair granthanirmāṇaiḥ pratiṣṭhā tāvad āpyate /
analyzed: pāṭhanaiḥ grantha nirmāṇaiḥ pratiṣṭhā tāvat āpyate

original: evam ca tathyavyutpattir āyuṣo 'nte bhaven na vā // NKv_6 //
analyzed: evam ca tathya vyutpattiḥ āyuṣaḥ nte bhavet na vā

original: stotāraḥ ke bhaviṣyanti mūrkhasya jagatītale /
analyzed: stotāraḥ ke bhaviṣyanti mūrkhasya jagatī tale

original: na stauti cet svayaṃ ca svaṃ kadā tasyāstu nirvṛtis // NKv_7 //
analyzed: na stauti ced svayam ca svam kadā tasya astu nirvṛtiḥ

original: vācyatāṃ samayo 'tītaḥ spaṣṭam agre bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: vācyatām spaṣṭam agre bhaviṣyati

original: iti pāṭhayatāṃ granthe kāṭhinyaṃ kutra vartate // NKv_8 //
analyzed: iti pāṭhayatām granthe kāṭhinyam kutra vartate

original: agatitvam atiśraddhā jñānābhāsena tṛptatā /
analyzed: agati tvam ati śraddhā jñāna ābhāsena tṛpta tā

original: trayaḥ śiṣyaguṇā hy ete mūrkhācāryasya bhāgyajās // NKv_9 //
analyzed: trayaḥ śiṣya guṇāḥ hi ete mūrkha ācāryasya bhāgya jāḥ

original: yadi na kvāpi vidyāyāṃ sarvathā kramate matis /
analyzed: yadi na kvāpi vidyāyām sarvathā kramate matiḥ

original: māntrikās tu bhaviṣyāmo yogino yatayo 'pi vā // NKv_10 //
analyzed: māntrikāḥ tu bhaviṣyāmaḥ yoginaḥ yatayaḥ vā

original: avilambena saṃsiddhau māntrikair āpyate yaśas /
analyzed: avilambena saṃsiddhau māntrikaiḥ āpyate yaśaḥ

original: vilambe karmabāhulyaṃ vikhyāpyāvāpyate dhanam // NKv_11 //
analyzed: vilambe karma bāhulyam vikhyāpya avāpyate dhanam

original: sukhaṃ sukhiṣu duḥkhe 'pi jīvanaṃ duḥkhaśāliṣu /
analyzed: sukham sukhiṣu duḥkhe jīvanam duḥkha śāliṣu

original: anugrahāyate yeṣāṃ te dhanyāḥ khalu māntrikās // NKv_12 //
analyzed: anugrahāyate yeṣām te dhanyāḥ khalu māntrikāḥ

original: *VAR: 12b em: sukhe sukhiṣu
analyzed: var em sukhe sukhiṣu

original: yāvad ajñānato maunam ācāro vā vilakṣaṇas /
analyzed: yāvat ajñānataḥ maunam ācāraḥ vā vilakṣaṇaḥ

original: tāvan māhātmyarūpeṇa paryavasyati māntrike // NKv_13 //
analyzed: tāvat māhātmya rūpeṇa paryavasyati māntrike

original: cārān vicārya daivajñair vaktavyaṃ bhūbhujāṃ phalam /
analyzed: cārān vicārya daivajñaiḥ vaktavyam bhūbhujām phalam

original: grahacāraparijñānaṃ teṣām āvaśyakaṃ yatas // NKv_14 //
analyzed: graha cāra parijñānam teṣām āvaśyakam yatas

original: putra ity eva pitari kanyakety eva mātari /
analyzed: putraḥ iti eva pitari kanyakā iti eva mātari

original: garbhapraśneṣu kathayan daivajño vijayī bhavet // NKv_15 //
analyzed: garbha praśneṣu kathayan daiva jñaḥ vijayī bhavet

original: āyuspraśne dīrgham āyur vācyaṃ mauhūrtikair janais /
analyzed: āyus praśne dīrgham āyuḥ vācyam mauhūrtikaiḥ janaiḥ

original: jīvanto bahumanyante mṛtāḥ prakṣyanti kaṃ punas // NKv_16 //
analyzed: jīvantaḥ bahu manyante mṛtāḥ prakṣyanti kam punar

original: sarvaṃ koṭidvayopetaṃ sarvaṃ kāladvayāvadhi /
analyzed: sarvam koṭi dvaya upetam sarvam kāla dvaya avadhi

original: sarvaṃ vyāmiśram iva ca vaktavyaṃ daivacintakais // NKv_17 //
analyzed: sarvam vyāmiśram iva ca vaktavyam daiva cintakaiḥ

original: nirdhanānāṃ dhanāvāptiṃ dhaninām adhikaṃ dhanam /
analyzed: nirdhanānām dhana avāptim dhaninām adhikam dhanam

original: bruvāṇāḥ sarvathā grāhyā lokair jyautiṣikā janās // NKv_18 //
analyzed: bruvāṇāḥ sarvathā grāhyāḥ lokaiḥ jyautiṣikāḥ janāḥ

original: śatasya lābhe tāmbūlaṃ sahasrasya tu bhojanam /
analyzed: śatasya lābhe tāmbūlam sahasrasya tu bhojanam

original: daivajñānām upālambho nityaḥ kāryaviparyaye // NKv_19 //
analyzed: daivajñānām upālambhaḥ nityaḥ kārya viparyaye

original: api sāgaraparyantā vicetavyā vasuṃdharā /
analyzed: api sāgara paryantā vicetavyā vasuṃdharā

original: deśo hy aratnimātre 'pi nāsti daivajñavarjitas // NKv_20 //
analyzed: deśaḥ hi aratni mātre na asti daivajña varjitaḥ

original: vārān ke cid grahān ke cit ke cid ṛkṣāṇi jānate /
analyzed: vārān ke cit grahān ke cit ke cit ṛkṣāṇi jānate

original: tritayaṃ ye vijānanti te vācaspatayaḥ svayam // NKv_21 //
analyzed: tritayam ye vijānanti te vācaspatayaḥ svayam

original: naimittikāḥ svapnadṛśo devatānām [[amī trayaḥ]] /
analyzed: naimittikāḥ svapna dṛśaḥ devatānām amī trayaḥ

original: nisargaśatravaḥ sṛṣṭā daivajñānām amī trayas // NKv_22 //
analyzed: nisarga śatravaḥ sṛṣṭāḥ daivajñānām amī trayaḥ

original: svasthair asādhyarogaiś ca jantubhir nāsti kiṃ cana /
analyzed: svasthaiḥ asādhya rogaiḥ ca jantubhiḥ nā asti kim cana

original: kātarā dīrgharogāś ca bhiṣajāṃ bhāgyahetavas // NKv_23 //
analyzed: kātarāḥ dīrgha rogāḥ ca bhiṣajām bhāgya hetavaḥ

original: nātidhairyaṃ pradātavyaṃ nātibhītiś ca rogiṇi /
analyzed: na ati dhairyam pradātavyam na ati bhītiḥ ca rogiṇi

original: naiścintyān nādime dānaṃ nairāśyād eva nāntime // NKv_24 //
analyzed: naiścintyāt na ādime dānam nairāśyāt eva na antime

original: bhaiṣajyaṃ tu yathākāmaṃ pathyaṃ tu kaṭhinaṃ vadet /
analyzed: bhaiṣajyam tu yathākāmam pathyam tu kaṭhinam vadet

original: ārogyaṃ vaidyamāhātmyād anyathātvam apathyatas // NKv_25 //
analyzed: ārogyam vaidya māhātmyāt anyathātvam apathyatas

original: nidānaṃ roganāmāni sātmyāsātmye cikitsitam /
analyzed: nidānam roga nāmāni sātmya asātmye cikitsitam

original: sarvam apy upadekṣyanti rogiṇaḥ sadane striyas // NKv_26 //
analyzed: sarvam api upadekṣyanti rogiṇaḥ sadane striyaḥ

original: jṛmbhamāṇeṣu rogeṣu mriyamāṇeṣu jantuṣu /
analyzed: jṛmbhamāṇeṣu rogeṣu mriyamāṇeṣu jantuṣu

original: rogatattveṣu śanakair vyutpadyante cikitsakās // NKv_27 //
analyzed: roga tattveṣu śanakais vyutpadyante cikitsakāḥ

original: pravartanārtham ārambhe madhye tv auṣadhahetave /
analyzed: pravartana artham ārambhe madhye tu auṣadha hetave

original: bahumānārtham ante ca jihīrṣanti cikitsakās // NKv_28 //
analyzed: bahu māna artham ante ca jihīrṣanti cikitsakāḥ

original: lipsamāneṣu vaidyeṣu cirād āsādya rogiṇam /
analyzed: lipsamāneṣu vaidyeṣu cirāt āsādya rogiṇam

original: dāyādāḥ saṃprarohanti daivajñā māntrikā api // NKv_29 //
analyzed: dāyādāḥ saṃprarohanti daiva jñāḥ māntrikāḥ api

original: rogasyopakrame sāntvaṃ madhye kiṃ cid dhanavyayas /
analyzed: rogasya upakrame sāntvam madhye kim cit

original: śanair anādaras śāntau snāto vaidyaṃ na paśyati // NKv_30 //
analyzed: śanais anādaraḥ śāntau snātaḥ vaidyam na paśyati

original: daivajñatvaṃ māntrikatā bhaiṣajyaṃ cāṭukauśalam /
analyzed: daiva jña tvam māntrika tā bhaiṣajyam cāṭu kauśalam

original: ekaikam arthalābhāya dvitriyogas tu durlabhas // NKv_31 //
analyzed: ekaikam artha lābhāya dvi tri yogaḥ tu durlabhaḥ

original: anṛtaṃ cāṭuvādaś ca dhanayogo mahān ayam /
analyzed: anṛtam cāṭu vādaḥ ca dhana yogaḥ mahān ayam

original: satyaṃ vaiduṣyam ity eṣa yogo dāridryakārakas // NKv_32 //
analyzed: satyam vaiduṣyam iti eṣa yogaḥ dāridrya kārakaḥ

original: kātaryaṃ durvinītatvaṃ kārpaṇyam avivekatām /
analyzed: kātaryam durvinīta tvam kārpaṇyam aviveka tām

original: sarvaṃ mārjanti kavayaḥ śālīnāṃ muṣṭikiṃkarās // NKv_33 //
analyzed: sarvam mārjanti kavayaḥ śālīnām muṣṭi kiṃkarāḥ

original: na kāraṇam apekṣante kavayaḥ stotum udyatās /
analyzed: na kāraṇam apekṣante kavayaḥ stotum udyatāḥ

original: kiṃ cid astuvatām teṣāṃ jihvā phuraphurāyate // NKv_34 //
analyzed: kim cit astuvatām teṣām jihvā phuraphurāyate

original: stutaṃ stuvanti kavayo na svato guṇadarśinas /
analyzed: stutam stuvanti kavayaḥ na svatas guṇa darśinaḥ

original: kītaḥ kaś cid alir nāma kiyatī tatra varṇanā // NKv_35 //
analyzed: kītaḥ kaḥ cit aliḥ nāma kiyatī tatra varṇanā

original: ekaiva kavitā puṃsāṃ grāmāyāśvāya hastine /
analyzed: ekā eva kavi tā puṃsām grāmāya aśvāya hastine

original: antato 'nnāya vastrāya tāmbūlāya ca kalpate // NKv_36 //
analyzed: antatas nnāya vastrāya tāmbūlāya ca kalpate

original: śabdākhyam aparaṃ brahma saṃdarbheṇa pariṣkṛtam /
analyzed: śabda ākhyam aparam brahma saṃdarbheṇa pariṣkṛtam

original: vikrīyate katipayair vṛthānyair viniyujyate // NKv_37 //
analyzed: vikrīyate katipayaiḥ vṛthā anyaiḥ viniyujyate

original: varṇayanti narābhāsān vāṇīṃ labdhvāpi ye janās /
analyzed: varṇayanti nara ābhāsān vāṇīm labdhvā api ye janāḥ

original: labdhvāpi kāmadhenuṃ te lāṅgale viniyuñjate // NKv_38 //
analyzed: labdhvā api kāmadhenum te lāṅgale viniyuñjate

original: praśaṃsanto narābhāsān pralapanto 'nyathānyathā /
analyzed: praśaṃsantaḥ nara ābhāsān pralapantaḥ nyathā anyathā

original: kathaṃ tarantu kavayaḥ kāmapāramyavādinas // NKv_39 //
analyzed: katham tarantu kavayaḥ

original: yat sandarbhe yad ullekhe yad vyaṅgye nibhṛtaṃ manas /
analyzed: yat sandarbhe yat ullekhe yat vyaṅgye nibhṛtam manaḥ

original: samādher api taj jyāyāḥ śaṃkaro yadi varṇyate // NKv_40 //
analyzed: samādheḥ api tat jyāyāḥ śaṃkaraḥ yadi varṇyate

original: [bandhavaḥ]
analyzed: bandhavaḥ

original: gṛhiṇī bhaginī tasyāḥ śvaśurau śyāla ity api /
analyzed: gṛhiṇī bhaginī tasyāḥ śvaśurau śyālaḥ iti api

original: prāṇinām kalinā sṛṣṭāḥ pañca prāṇā ime 'pare // NKv_41 //
analyzed: prāṇinām kalinā sṛṣṭāḥ pañca prāṇāḥ ime pare

original: jāmātaro bhāgineyā mātulā dārabāndhavās /
analyzed: jāmātaraḥ bhāgineyāḥ mātulāḥ dāra bāndhavāḥ

original: ajñātā eva gṛhiṇāṃ bhakṣayanty ākhuvad gṛhe // NKv_42 //
analyzed: a jñātāḥ eva gṛhiṇām bhakṣayanti ākhu vat gṛhe

original: mātulasya balaṃ mātā jāmātur duhitā balam /
analyzed: mātulasya balam mātā jāmātuḥ duhitā balam

original: śvaśurasya balaṃ bhāryā svayam evātither balam // NKv_43 //
analyzed: śvaśurasya balam bhāryā svayam eva atitheḥ balam

original: jāmātur vakratā tāvad yāvac chyālasya bālatā /
analyzed: jāmātuḥ vakra tā tāvat yāvat śyālasya bāla tā

original: prabudhyamāne sāralyaṃ prabuddhe 'smin palāyanam // NKv_44 //
analyzed: prabudhyamāne sāralyam prabuddhe smin palāyanam

original: bhāryā jyeṣṭhā śiśuḥ śyālaḥ śvaśrūḥ svātantryavartinī /
analyzed: bhāryā jyeṣṭhā śiśuḥ śyālaḥ śvaśrūḥ svātantrya vartinī

original: śvaśuras tu pravāsīti jāmātur bhāgyadhoraṇī // NKv_45 //
analyzed: śvaśuraḥ tu pravāsi iti jāmātuḥ bhāgya dhoraṇī

original: bhūṣaṇair vāsanaiḥ pātraiḥ putrāṇām upalālanais /
analyzed: bhūṣaṇaiḥ vāsanaiḥ pātraiḥ putrāṇām upalālanaiḥ

original: sakṛd āgatya gacchantī kanyā nirmārṣṭi mandiram // NKv_46 //
analyzed: sakṛt āgatya gacchantī kanyā nirmārṣṭi mandiram

original: gṛhiṇī svajanaṃ vakti śuṣkāhāraṃ mitāśanam /
analyzed: gṛhiṇī sva janam vakti śuṣka āhāram mita aśanam

original: patipakṣyāṃs tu bahvāśān kṣīrapāṃs taskarān api // NKv_47 //
analyzed: pati pakṣyān tu bahu āśān kṣīrapān taskarān api

original: bhārye dve putraśālinyau bhaginī pativarjitā /
analyzed: bhārye dve putra śālinyau bhaginī pati varjitā

original: aśrāntakalaho nāma yogo 'yaṃ gṛhamedhinām // NKv_48 //
analyzed: aśrāntakalahaḥ nāma yogaḥ yam gṛhamedhinām

original: bhārye dve bahavaḥ putrā dāridryaṃ rogasaṃbhavas /
analyzed: bhārye dve bahavaḥ putrāḥ dāridryam roga saṃbhavaḥ

original: jīrṇau ca mātāpitarāv ekaikaṃ narakādhikam // NKv_49 //
analyzed: jīrṇau ca mātā pitarau ekaikam naraka adhikam

original: [uttamaṛṇāḥ]
analyzed: uttama ṛṇāḥ

original: smṛte sīdanti gātrāṇi dṛṣṭe prajñā vinaśyati /
analyzed: smṛte sīdanti gātrāṇi dṛṣṭe prajñā vinaśyati

original: aho mahad idaṃ bhūtam uttamarṇābhiśābdhitam // NKv_50 //
analyzed: aho mahat idam bhūtam

original: antako 'pi hi jantūnām antakālam apekṣate /
analyzed: antakaḥ pi hi jantūnām anta kālam apekṣate

original: na kālaniyamaḥ kaś cid uttamārṇasya vidyate // NKv_51 //
analyzed: na kāla niyamaḥ kaḥ cit uttamārṇasya vidyate

original: na paśyāmo mukhe daṃṣṭrāṃ na pāśaṃ vā karāñjale /
analyzed: na paśyāmaḥ mukhe daṃṣṭrām na pāśam vā kara añjale

original: uttamārṇam avekṣyaiva tathāpy udvejite manas // NKv_52 //
analyzed: uttama arṇam avekṣya eva tathā api udvejite manaḥ

original: [dāridryam]
analyzed: dāridryam

original: śatrau sāntvaṃ pratīkāraḥ sarvarogeṣu bheṣajam /
analyzed: śatrau sāntvam pratīkāraḥ sarva rogeṣu bheṣajam

original: mṛtyau mṛtyuñjayadhyānaṃ dāridrye tu na kiṃ cana // NKv_53 //
analyzed: mṛtyau mṛtyuñjaya dhyānam dāridrye tu na kim cana

original: śaktiṃ karoti saṃcāre śītoṣṇe marṣayaty api /
analyzed: śaktim karoti saṃcāre śīta uṣṇe marṣayati api

original: dīpayaty udare vahniṃ dāridryaṃ paramauṣadham // NKv_54 //
analyzed: dīpayati udare vahnim dāridryam parama auṣadham

original: giraṃ skhalantīṃ mīlantīṃ dṛṣṭiṃ pādau visaṃsthulau /
analyzed: giram skhalantīm mīlantīm dṛṣṭim pādau visaṃsthulau

original: protsāhayati yācñāyāṃ rājājñeva daridratā // NKv_55 //
analyzed: protsāhayati yācñāyām rāja ājñā iva daridra tā

original: *VAR. 55b: em: visaṃsthulau; ed:
analyzed: var em visaṃsthulau ed

original: visaṃsphuṭau
analyzed: visaṃsphuṭau

original: jīryanti rājavidveṣā jīryanty avihitāny api /
analyzed: jīryanti rāja vidveṣāḥ jīryanti a vihitāni api

original: ākiṃcanyabalāḍhyānām antato 'śmāpi jīryati // NKv_56 //
analyzed: ākiṃcanya bala āḍhyānām śmā api jīryati

original: nāsya corā na piśunā na dāyādā na pārthivās /
analyzed: na asya corāḥ na piśunāḥ na dāyādāḥ na pārthivāḥ

original: dainyaṃ rājyād api jyāyo yadi tattvaṃ prabudhyate // NKv_57 //
analyzed: dainyam rājyāt api jyāyaḥ yadi tattvam prabudhyate

original: [dhaninaḥ]
analyzed: dhaninaḥ

original: prakāśayaty ahaṃkāraṃ pravartayati taskarān /
analyzed: prakāśayati ahaṃkāram pravartayati taskarān

original: protsāhayati dāyādāṃl lākṣmīḥ kiṃ cid upasthitā // NKv_58 //
analyzed: protsāhayati dāyādān lākṣmīḥ kim cit upasthitā

original: viḍambayanti ye nityaṃ vidagdhān dhanino janās /
analyzed: viḍambayanti ye nityam vidagdhān dhaninaḥ janāḥ

original: ta eva tu viḍambyante śriyā kimcidupekṣitās // NKv_59 //
analyzed: te eva tu viḍambyante śriyā kimcid upekṣitāḥ

original: prāmāṇyabuddhiḥ stotreṣu devatābuddhir ātmani /
analyzed: prāmāṇya buddhiḥ stotreṣu devatā buddhiḥ ātmani

original: kīṭabuddhir manuṣyeṣu nūtanāyāḥ śriyaḥ phalam // NKv_60 //
analyzed: kīṭa buddhiḥ manuṣyeṣu nūtanāyāḥ śriyaḥ phalam

original: śṛṇvanta eva pṛcchanti paśyanto 'pi na jānate /
analyzed: śṛṇvantaḥ eva pṛcchanti paśyantaḥ pi na jānate

original: viḍambanāni dhanikāḥ stotrāṇīty eva manvate // NKv_61 //
analyzed: viḍambanāni dhanikāḥ stotrāṇi iti eva manvate

original: āvṛtya śrīmadenāndhān anyonyakṛtasaṃvidas /
analyzed: āvṛtya śrīmadena andhān anyonya kṛta saṃvidaḥ

original: svairaṃ hasanti+pārśvasthā bālonmattapiśācavat // NKv_62 //
analyzed: svairam hasanti pārśva sthāḥ bāla unmatta piśāca vat

original: stotavyaiḥ stūyante nityaṃ sevanīyaiś ca sevyate /
analyzed: stotavyaiḥ stūyante nityam sevanīyaiḥ ca sevyate

original: na bibheti na jihreti tathāpi dhaniko janas // NKv_63 //
analyzed: na bibheti na jihreti tathā api dhanikaḥ janaḥ

original: kṣaṇamātraṃ grahāveśo yāmamātraṃ surāmadas /
analyzed: kṣaṇa mātram graha āveśaḥ yāma mātram surā madaḥ

original: lakṣmīmadas tu mūrkhāṇām ādeham anuvartate // NKv_64 //
analyzed: lakṣmī madaḥ tu mūrkhāṇām ādeham anuvartate

original: śrīr māsam ardhamāsaṃ vā ceṣṭitvā vinivartate /
analyzed: śrīḥ māsam ardha māsam vā ceṣṭitvā vinivartate

original: vikāras tu tadārabdho nityaṃ laśunagandhavat // NKv_65 //
analyzed: vikāraḥ tu tad ārabdhaḥ nityam laśuna gandha vat

original: kaṇṭḥe madaḥ kodravajo hṛdi tāmbūlajo madas /
analyzed: kaṇṭṭe madaḥ kodrava jaḥ hṛdi tāmbūla jaḥ madaḥ

original: lakṣmīmadas tu sarvāṅge putradāramukheṣv api // NKv_66 //
analyzed: lakṣmī madaḥ tu sarva aṅge putra dāra mukheṣu api

original: yatrāsīd asti vā lakṣmīs tatronmadaḥ pravartatām /
analyzed: yatra āsīt asti vā lakṣmīḥ tatra unmadaḥ pravartatām

original: kule 'py avataraty eṣa kuṣṭhāpasmāravat katham // NKv_67 //
analyzed: kule pi avatarati eṣa kuṣṭha apasmāra vat katham

original: adhyāpayanti śāstrāṇi tṛṇīkurvanti paṇḍitān /
analyzed: adhyāpayanti śāstrāṇi tṛṇīkurvanti paṇḍitān

original: vismārayanti jātiṃ svāṃ varāṭāḥ pañcaṣā kare // NKv_68 //
analyzed: vismārayanti jātim svām varāṭāḥ pañcaṣā kare

original: bibhartu bhṛtyān dhaniko dattāṃ vā deyam arthiṣu /
analyzed: bibhartu bhṛtyān dhanikaḥ dattām vā deyam arthiṣu

original: yāvad yācakasādharmyaṃ tāval loko na mṛṣyati // NKv_69 //
analyzed: yāvat yācaka sādharmyam tāvat lokaḥ na mṛṣyati

original: [piśunāḥ]
analyzed: piśunāḥ

original: dhanabhāro hi lokasya piśunair eva dhāryate /
analyzed: dhana bhāraḥ hi lokasya piśunaiḥ eva dhāryate

original: kathaṃ te taṃ laghūkartuṃ yatante 'parathā svatas // NKv_70 //
analyzed: katham te tam laghūkartum yatante parathā svatas

original: śramānurūpaṃ piśune kim upakriyate nṛpais /
analyzed: śrama anurūpam piśune kim upakriyate nṛpaiḥ

original: dviguṇaṃ triguṇaṃ caiva kṛtānto lālayiṣyati // NKv_71 //
analyzed: dviguṇam triguṇam ca eva kṛtāntaḥ lālayiṣyati

original: Gokarṇe Bhadrakarṇe ca japo duṣkarmanāśanas /
analyzed: gokarṇe bhadrakarṇe ca japaḥ duṣkarma nāśanaḥ

original: rājakarṇe japaḥ sadyaḥ sarvakarmavināśanas // NKv_72 //
analyzed: rāja karṇe japaḥ sadyas sarva karma vināśanaḥ

original: na svārthaṃ kimcid icchanti na preryante ca kena cit /
analyzed: na sva artham kimcid icchanti na preryante ca kena cid

original: parārtheṣu pravartante śaṭhāḥ santaś ca tulyavat // NKv_73 //
analyzed: para artheṣu pravartante śaṭhāḥ santaḥ ca tulya vat

original: kālāntare hy anarthāya gṛdhro gehopari sthitas /
analyzed: kāla antare hi anarthāya gṛdhraḥ geha upari

original: khalo gṛhasamīpasthaḥ sadyo 'narthāya dehinām // NKv_74 //
analyzed: khalaḥ gṛha samīpa sthaḥ sadyas narthāya dehinām

original: [lobhinaḥ]
analyzed: lobhinaḥ

original: śuṣkopavāso dharmeṣu bhaiṣajyeṣu ca laṅghanam /
analyzed: śuṣka upavāsaḥ dharmeṣu bhaiṣajyeṣu ca laṅghanam

original: japayajñaś ca yajñeṣu rocate lobhaśālinām // NKv_75 //
analyzed: japa yajñaḥ ca yajñeṣu rocate lobha śālinām

original: kiṃ vakṣyatīva dhanikād yāvad udvijate 'dhanas /
analyzed: kim vakṣyati iva dhanikāt yāvat udvijate

original: kiṃ prakṣyatīti lubdho 'pi tāvad udvijate tatas // NKv_76 //
analyzed: kim prakṣyati iti lubdhaḥ tāvat udvijate tatas

original: sarvam ātithyaśāstrārthaṃ sākṣāt kurvanti lobhinas /
analyzed: sarvam ātithya śāstra artham sākṣāt kurvanti lobhinaḥ

original: bhikṣākabalam ekaikaṃ ye hi paśyanti meruvat // NKv_77 //
analyzed: bhikṣāka balam ekaikam ye hi paśyanti meru vat

original: dhanapālaḥ piśāco hi datte svāminy upasthite /
analyzed: dhanapālaḥ piśācaḥ hi datte svāmini upasthite

original: dhanalubdhaḥ piśācas tu na kasmai cana ditsate // NKv_78 //
analyzed: dhana lubdhaḥ piśācaḥ tu na kasmai cana ditsate

original: dātāro 'rthibhir arthyante dātṛbhiḥ punar arthinas /
analyzed: dātāraḥ rthibhiḥ arthyante dātṛbhiḥ punar arthinaḥ

original: kartṛkarmavyatīhārād aho nimnonnataṃ kiyat // NKv_79 //
analyzed: kartṛ karma vyatīhārāt aho nimna unnatam kiyat

original: svasminn asati nārthasya rakṣakaḥ saṃbhaved iti /
analyzed: svasmin asati na arthasya rakṣakaḥ saṃbhavet iti

original: niścityaivaṃ svayam api bhuṅkte lubdhaḥ kathaṃ cana // NKv_80 //
analyzed: niścitya evam svayam api bhuṅkte lubdhaḥ katham cana

original: prasthāsyamānaḥ praviśet pratiṣṭheta dine dine /
analyzed: prasthāsyamānaḥ praviśet pratiṣṭheta dine dine

original: vicitrān ullikhed vighnāṃs tiṣṭhāsur atithiś ciram // NKv_81 //
analyzed: vicitrān ullikhet vighnān tiṣṭhāsuḥ atithiḥ ciram

original: [dhārmikāḥ]
analyzed: dhārmikāḥ

original: pradīyate viduṣy ekaṃ kavau daśa naṭe śatam /
analyzed: pradīyate viduṣi ekam kavau daśa naṭe śatam

original: sahasraṃ dāmbhike loke śrotriye tu na kimcana // NKv_82 //
analyzed: sahasram dāmbhike loke śrotriye tu na kimcana

original: ghaṭakaṃ samyagārādhya vairāgyaṃ paramaṃ vahet /
analyzed: ghaṭakam samyak ārādhya vairāgyam paramam vahet

original: tāvad arthāḥ prasiddhyanti yāvac cāpalam āvṛtam // NKv_83 //
analyzed: tāvat arthāḥ prasiddhyanti yāvat cāpalam āvṛtam

original: ekataḥ sarvaśāstrāṇi tulasīkāṣṭham ekatas /
analyzed: ekatas sarva śāstrāṇi tulasīkāṣṭham ekatas

original: vaktavyaṃ kiṃ cid ity uktaṃ vastutas tulasī parā // NKv_84 //
analyzed: vaktavyam kim cit iti uktam vastutas tulasī parā

original: vismṛtaṃ vāhaṭenedaṃ tulasyāḥ paṭhatā guṇan /
analyzed: vismṛtam vāhaṭena idam tulasyāḥ paṭhatā

original: viśvasaṃmohinī vitta- dāyinīti guṇadvayam // NKv_85 //
analyzed: viśva saṃmohinī vitta dāyinī iti guṇa dvayam

original: kaupīnaṃ bhasitālepo darbhā+rudrākṣamālikā /
analyzed: kaupīnam bhasita ālepaḥ darbha a rudrākṣa mālikā

original: maunam ekāsikā ceti mūrkhasaṃjīvanāni ṣaṭ // NKv_86 //
analyzed: maunam ekāsikā ca iti mūrkha saṃjīvanāni ṣaḍ

original: vāsaḥ puṇyeṣu tīrtheṣu prasiddhaś ca mṛto gurus /
analyzed: vāsaḥ puṇyeṣu tīrtheṣu prasiddhaḥ ca mṛtaḥ guruḥ

original: adhyāpanāvṛttayaś ca kīrtanīyā dhanārthibhis // NKv_87 //
analyzed: adhyāpana āvṛttayaḥ ca kīrtanīyāḥ dhana arthibhiḥ

original: mantrabhraṃśe saṃpradāyaḥ prayogaś cyutasaṃkṛtau /
analyzed: mantra bhraṃśe saṃpradāyaḥ prayogaḥ cyuta saṃkṛtau

original: deśadharmas tv anācāre pṛcchatāṃ siddham uttaram // NKv_88 //
analyzed: deśa dharmaḥ tu anācāre pṛcchatām siddham uttaram

original: yathā jānanti bahavo yathā vakṣyanti dātari /
analyzed: yathā jānanti bahavaḥ yathā vakṣyanti dātari

original: tathā dharmaṃ caret sarvaṃ na vṛthā kiṃ cid ācaret // NKv_89 //
analyzed: tathā dharmam caret sarvam na vṛthā kim cit ācaret

original: sadā japapaṭo haste madhye madhye 'kṣimīlanam /
analyzed: sadā japa paṭaḥ haste madhye madhye kṣimīlanam

original: sarvaṃ brahmeti vādaś ca sadyaspratyayahetavas // NKv_90 //
analyzed: sarvam brahma iti vādaḥ ca sadyaspratyaya hetavaḥ

original: āmadhyāhnaṃ nadīvāsaḥ samāje devatārcanam /
analyzed: ā madhyāhnam nadī vāsaḥ samāje devatā arcanam

original: satataṃ śuciveṣaś cety etad dambhasya jīvitam // NKv_91 //
analyzed: satatam śuci veṣaḥ ca iti etat dambhasya jīvitam

original: tāvad dīrghaṃ nityakarma yāvat syād draṣṭṛmelanam /
analyzed: tāvat dīrgham nityakarma yāvat syāt draṣṭṛ melanam

original: tāvatsaṃkṣipyate sarvaṃ yāvad draṣṭā na vidyate // NKv_92 //
analyzed: tāvat saṃkṣipyate sarvam yāvat draṣṭā na vidyate

original: ānandabāṣparomāñcau yasya svecchāvaśaṃvadau /
analyzed: ānanda bāṣpa romāñcau yasya sva icchā vaśaṃvadau

original: kiṃ tasya sādhanair anyaiḥ kiṃkarāḥ sarvapārthivās // NKv_93 //
analyzed: kim tasya sādhanaiḥ anyaiḥ kiṃkarāḥ sarva pārthivāḥ

original: [durjanāḥ]
analyzed: durjanāḥ

original: daṇḍyamānā vikurvanti lālyamānās tatas tarām /
analyzed: daṇḍyamānāḥ vikurvanti lālyamānāḥ tatas tarām

original: durjanānām ato nyāyyaṃ dūrād eva visarjanam // NKv_94 //
analyzed: durjanānām atas nyāyyam dūrāt eva visarjanam

original: adānam īṣaddānaṃ ca kimcitkopāya durdhiyām /
analyzed: a dānam īṣat dānam ca kimcid kopāya

original: saṃpūrṇadānaṃ prakṛtir virāmo vairakāraṇam // NKv_95 //
analyzed: saṃpūrṇa dānam prakṛtiḥ virāmaḥ vaira kāraṇam

original: jyāyān asaṃstavo duṣṭair īrṣyāyai saṃstavaḥ punas /
analyzed: jyāyān a saṃstavaḥ duṣṭaiḥ īrṣyāyai saṃstavaḥ punar

original: apatyasaṃbandhavidhiḥ svānarthāyaiva kevalam // NKv_96 //
analyzed: apatya saṃbandha vidhiḥ sva anarthāya eva kevalam

original: jñāteyaṃ jñānahīnatvaṃ piśunatvaṃ daridratā /
analyzed: jñāteyam jñāna hīna tvam piśuna tvam daridra tā

original: milanti yadi catvāri tad diśe 'pi namo namas // NKv_97 //
analyzed: milanti yadi catvāri tat diśe namaḥ namaḥ

original: parachidreṣu hṛdayaṃ paravārtāsu ca śravas /
analyzed: para chidreṣu hṛdayam para vārtāsu ca śravaḥ

original: paramarmāsu vācaṃ ca khalānām asṛjad vidhis // NKv_98 //
analyzed: para marmāsu vācam ca khalānām asṛjat vidhiḥ

original: viṣeṇa pucchalagnena vṛścikaḥ prāṇinām iva /
analyzed: viṣeṇa puccha lagnena vṛścikaḥ prāṇinām iva

original: kalinā daśamāṃśena sarvaḥ kālo 'pi dāruṇas // NKv_99 //
analyzed: kalinā daśama aṃśena sarvaḥ kālaḥ api dāruṇaḥ

original: yatra bhāryāgiro vedā yatra dharmo 'rthasādhanam /
analyzed: yatra bhāryā giraḥ vedāḥ yatra dharmaḥ ṛtha sādhanam

original: yatra svapratibhā mānaṃ tasmai śrīkalaye namas // NKv_100 //
analyzed: yatra sva pratibhā mānam tasmai śrī kalaye namaḥ

original: kāmam astu jagat sarvaṃ kālasyāsya vaśaṃvadam /
analyzed: kāmam astu jagat sarvam kālasya asya vaśaṃvadam

original: kālakālaṃ prapannānāṃ kālaḥ kiṃ naḥ kariṣyati? // NKv_101 //
analyzed: kāla kālam prapannānām kālaḥ kim naḥ kariṣyati

original: kavinā nīlakaṇṭhena kaler etad viḍambanam /
analyzed: kavinā nīlakaṇṭhena kaleḥ etat viḍambanam

original: racitaṃ viduṣāṃ prītyai rājāsthānānumodanam // NKv_102 //
analyzed: racitam viduṣām prītyai rāja āsthāna anumodanam

original: iti Nīlakaṇṭhaviracitaṃ Kaliviḍambanaṃ saṃpūrṇam
analyzed: iti nīlakaṇṭha viracitam kaliviḍambanam saṃpūrṇam
